dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: DeepSeek sinks stocks, Big Tech earnings, and AI for cancer: AI news roundup
News Content: Graphic: Images: Justin Sullivan, David Paul Morris/Bloomberg, Chesnot, Justin Sullivan / Staff

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off earlier this week that saw chip leader Nvidia lose almost $600 billion in market value — a record-setting loss for a U.S. company.

Meanwhile, investors awaited earnings results from Meta, Microsoft, and Apple.

Read about this and more in this week’s AI news roundup.

Microsoft stock falls almost 5% after modest Azure growthMicrosoft CEO Satya Nadella at OpenAI DevDay on November 6, 2023 in San Francisco, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) shares fell by around 5% during after-hours trading on Wednesday after it reported Azure cloud computing growth toward the bottom range of expectations.

Read More

Meta stock climbs after earnings beat on AI, smart glassesMeta CEO Mark Zuckerberg wearing Orion AR glasses during Meta Connect in Menlo Park, California on September 25, 2024. - Photo: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Meta (META) stock climbed by around 4% in after-hours trading after chief executive Mark Zuckerberg said on the company’s earnings call that it plans to invest “hundreds of billions of dollars” in artificial intelligence infrastructure in the long term.

Read More

Alibaba says it has an AI model even better than DeepSeekAlibaba Group at Viva Technology on June 14, 2023 in Paris, France. - Photo: Chesnot (Getty Images)

Days after Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off, a homegrown rival said its new AI model performed even better.

Read More

Microsoft thinks China’s DeepSeek might have used OpenAI’s tech before its big breakthroughIn this photo illustration, the DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Image: Justin Sullivan / Staff (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) and OpenAI are investigating whether a group connected to the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek accessed OpenAI’s data without permission, according to a new report.

Read More

Big Tech has a big DeepSeek problemDeepSeek logo displayed on a smartphone. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

Big Tech’s multi-billion dollar spending on artificial intelligence will be under investor scrutiny this week — even more so after China’s DeepSeek sent shockwaves through Wall Street and Silicon Valley with a cheap yet competitive AI model.

Read More

The White House is looking into DeepSeek over national security concernsThe DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Illustration: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

The White House is looking into national security concerns over the Chinese artificial intelligence app DeepSeek after its developer prompted a global tech sell-off.

Read More

DeepSeek is the ‘Temu of AI,’ analysts sayPhoto: Greg Baker/AFP (Getty Images)

After traders sold off global technology stocks en masse Monday on news of a Chinese artificial intelligence competitor, some aren’t too concerned with DeepSeek’s seemingly meteoric rise.

Read More

Trump says DeepSeek’s AI bombshell should be a ‘wake-up call’ for Big TechDonald Trump addresses the 2025 Republican Issues Conference at the Trump National Doral Miami on January 27, 2025 in Doral, Florida. - Photo: Joe Raedle (Getty Images)

The release of DeepSeek-R1, a new open-source reasoning model from a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, should be a “wake-up call” for the U.S. tech industry, President Donald Trump said.

Read More

LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman just raised $25 million to take on cancer with AIReid Hoffman, partner at Greylock Partners, during the Bloomberg Technology Summit in San Francisco, California, US, on Thursday, May 9, 2024. - Image: Bloomberg / Contributor (Getty Images)

LinkedIn (MSFT) co-founder and venture capitalist Reid Hoffman on Monday launched an AI startup aimed at discovering new treatments for cancer.

Story Continues

Read More

Big Retail is bringing out Big AI. Consumers might not even noticeNRF ‘25 Retail’s Big Show in New York on Jan. 14, 2025. - Photo: Francisco Velasquez/Quartz

AI is no longer just a buzzword in retail. It’s a tool retailers are increasingly deploying to transform their business operations.

Read More

Apple earnings are coming. Here’s what to expectApple CEO Tim Cook at the Apple Worldwide Developers Conference on June 5, 2023 in Cupertino, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Apple (AAPL) is expected to release its fiscal first quarter results after the market closes on Thursday.

Read More

Nvidia is doing damage control after DeepSeek’s AI advance routed the stockNvidia headquarters on February 23, 2024 in Santa Clara, California. - Photo: Andrej Sokolow/picture alliance (Getty Images)

Nvidia (NVDA) addressed its tumbling stock on Monday by saying Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek will need more of its chips for new models.

Read More

DeepSeek is limiting sign-ups after a ‘large-scale’ cyberattackDeepSeek, a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, is raising questions over the U.S.’s dominance in the field. - Image: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek said it would temporarily limit signups after being the victim of “large-scale malicious attacks” on its servers.

Read More

Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is rattling markets. Here’s what to knowPhoto illustration of DeepSeek’s logo on a smartphone screen. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

A Chinese artificial intelligence startup is rattling Silicon Valley and Wall Street after it demonstrated AI models on par with OpenAI’s — for a fraction of the cost and energy.

Read More

For the latest news, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.35, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.65, Reasoning: The news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to a sell-off triggered by the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has raised competition fears among major players like Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia. With Apple set to report earnings soon, investor sentiment is likely being influenced by the broader volatility in the tech market. While previous strong performance in AI investments is noted, the looming pressures from competition and expectations surrounding their own earnings introduce uncertainty. This may lead to more caution among investors, leading to a higher probability of price decline than an increase.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed bag for Apple (AAPL). Several articles highlight the competitive threat posed by Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has caused broader market concerns and even a tech stock sell-off, initially a negative signal. However, Nvidia has suggested that DeepSeek will need more of Nvidia's chips, suggesting that DeepSeek's advancement is real but not detrimental to chip leaders. Meta's success indicates market appetite for AI spends. Apple is gearing up to release its fiscal first quarter results. These earnings generate uncertainty until actually released. Considering the rise of AI development (as seen with Deepseek, Meta, and others), the possibility of positive announcements from Apple is present, as they have likely built some AI strategies of their own. Given the information available, a slightly higher chance of a positive (or no) movement is indicated by the recent events. However, the market is uncertain and dependent on what actually turns out for Apple. Therefore, a slight increase is expected, if anything.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news focuses heavily on DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, and its impact on the broader tech sector.  DeepSeek's competitive AI model caused a significant sell-off in tech stocks, including Nvidia, which lost a substantial portion of its market value. While Apple's performance is mentioned in relation to upcoming earnings, the overarching narrative centers on the competitive threat posed by DeepSeek and the uncertainty it creates for the industry. Microsoft's and Meta's reactions to the DeepSeek news (Microsoft's decline and Meta's investment in AI) further highlight the market's sensitivity to the development. The news doesn't directly mention any negative developments specific to Apple; therefore, a relatively neutral position is assumed until the earnings are released. The probability of a price increase is slightly lower due to the overall negative sentiment surrounding the AI sector. However, strong earnings could easily outweigh the negative market sentiment in the short term.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5, Reasoning: The news primarily focuses on the broader impact of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek on the tech sector, including a sell-off in tech stocks and concerns over AI competition. While Apple (AAPL) is mentioned as one of the companies awaiting earnings results, the news does not provide specific details about Apple's performance or outlook. The uncertainty surrounding the tech sector due to DeepSeek's rise could create cautious sentiment, but without direct negative or positive news about Apple, the impact is neutral to slightly negative. The anticipation of earnings could lead to volatility, but the overall sentiment from the news does not strongly suggest a rise or fall.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1, Reasoning: Fail to give a prediction. Error Reason: Parse error
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news article discusses the impact of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, on the tech industry and its potential to disrupt the dominance of Big Tech companies. The article mentions that Apple's earnings are expected to be released soon, but does not provide any specific information about Apple's performance or expectations. However, the overall sentiment of the article suggests that the tech industry is facing increased competition and uncertainty due to the emergence of new AI technologies. Given this context, the probability of Apple's stock price rising or falling is uncertain, but the negative sentiment towards the tech industry as a whole may have a slightly negative impact on Apple's stock price.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5, Reasoning: The news about DeepSeek's AI model affecting the tech sector generally may create negative sentiment towards tech stocks, including Apple. However, Apple's strong financial position and upcoming earnings could counterbalance these broader market sentiments.
Round: 1
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news highlights significant challenges for the tech sector due to the emergence of DeepSeek, a competitive AI startup, which has raised concerns among major players including Apple. While there is anticipation surrounding Apple's upcoming earnings report, the negative sentiment in the broader market, triggered by the sell-off in related tech stocks, creates an environment of uncertainty. Although Apple's strong market position and potential initiatives in AI could support its stock, the prevailing fears in the sector weigh heavily on investor sentiment. This analysis leads to a higher probability of the stock price falling compared to rising.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.43, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.57, Reasoning: The news cycle presents a mixed outlook for Apple. The rise of DeepSeek and its impact on the tech sector is a headwind, potentially leading to investor caution. However, other factors are at play. Meta's positive earnings highlight the potential upsides of AI investment, which could be mirrored by Apple if its earnings reveal strong AI positioning. Nvidia's comment indicates that DeepSeek relies on Nvidia's components, helping balance against competitive fears. Previous predictions in round 0 were diverse, with some leaning towards a more bearish outlook due to DeepSeek's disruptive potential. However, other predictions saw potential for positive Apple earnings. Considering these factors and given the anticipation of earnings, there's inherent uncertainty that slightly favors a fall, though a very negative prediction is not assured. I am slightly more weighting the negative sentiment but not significantly due to counter-examples in the news.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news is dominated by the impact of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, on the broader tech sector. This has created significant uncertainty and volatility, leading to a sell-off in many tech stocks. While Apple's upcoming earnings announcement is mentioned, there's no specific information directly affecting Apple's prospects.  The overall negative sentiment in the tech sector due to DeepSeek's competitive AI model weighs heavily on the probability of Apple's stock price rising.  However, Apple's strong financial performance (in previous quarters) and the potential for positive news during its earnings announcement introduce a degree of uncertainty that prevents a purely pessimistic outlook.  Considering the previous predictions, the consensus leans toward a slightly higher probability of a price fall, but the possibility of a price rise due to positive earnings remains.  The uncertainty surrounding earnings results makes the probability distribution relatively flat, but the prevalent market sentiment slightly tilts it toward a fall.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news highlights a significant sell-off in tech stocks triggered by the emergence of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, which has raised concerns about increased competition in the AI sector. While Apple's upcoming earnings report is mentioned, there is no specific positive or negative news directly impacting Apple. The broader negative sentiment in the tech sector, coupled with uncertainty around Apple's earnings, suggests a cautious outlook. Previous predictions from other models also reflect this mixed sentiment, with a slight tilt towards a higher probability of the stock price falling due to the overall market volatility and competitive pressures.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to a sell-off triggered by the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek. This has raised competition fears among major players like Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia. Apple's upcoming earnings report could potentially be impacted by the broader market volatility and uncertainty caused by DeepSeek's advancements and the reactions of other tech giants. While there is no direct negative news about Apple, the overall sentiment suggests caution, with a slight lean towards a potential decline due to the competitive pressures and market sensitivity.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The news article discusses the impact of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, on the tech industry and its potential to disrupt the dominance of Big Tech companies. While Apple's earnings are expected to be released soon, the overall sentiment of the article suggests that the tech industry is facing increased competition and uncertainty due to the emergence of new AI technologies. However, Apple's strong financial position and upcoming earnings could counterbalance these broader market sentiments. Considering the predictions from other models, there is a mixed sentiment towards the stock price movement, with some models predicting a higher probability of a price fall due to the negative sentiment surrounding the AI sector, while others predict a slight increase due to the possibility of positive announcements from Apple. Based on this analysis, the probability of the stock price rising is estimated to be slightly lower than the probability of the stock price falling.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The financial news highlights significant disruptions in the tech sector due to the rise of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup. The overall sentiment in the sector is negative, as reflected in the broad tech stock sell-off and concerns over AI competition. While Apple is set to release its fiscal first quarter results, the news itself does not provide specific details about Apple's performance or outlook. The anticipation of Apple's earnings introduces uncertainty. Previous predictions varied, ranging from slightly bearish to neutral. Considering the neutral position and mixed signals, alongside Apple's strong historical performance and upcoming earnings, the probability leans slightly towards a minor decline but remains somewhat balanced.
Round: 2
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The financial news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to a sell-off triggered by the emergence of DeepSeek, a competitor in the AI space that has raised fears among major companies like Apple. The upcoming earnings report from Apple introduces uncertainty, with potential for positive or negative impacts. Overall, the prevailing sentiment is cautious, with a higher probability leaning towards a stock price decline, especially given the negative market climate surrounding AI competition. However, there is still a chance for a positive outcome if Apple's earnings exceed expectations, which historically has been the case for the company. The mixed signals from other models suggest that while there is some room for optimism, the current sentiment is slightly weighted towards a price fall.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The repeated emphasis on DeepSeek's disruption of the tech market and its potential impact on Big Tech companies, coupled with the mixed reactions from Microsoft and Meta, continue to weigh on Apple's stock outlook. The anticipation of Apple's earnings report remains a key factor, but the general negative sentiment in the sector, driven by DeepSeek, overshadows any specific positive news related to Apple. Previous rounds show models consistently leaning towards a slightly higher probability of a price fall due to the overall market volatility and competitive pressures even considering that this is the earnings week. I will also continue to lean towards to a price fall since recent news is heavily influenced by AI news.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7, Reasoning: The news is overwhelmingly focused on the negative impact of DeepSeek on the broader tech sector, causing a significant sell-off. While Apple's upcoming earnings are mentioned, the article lacks specific information about Apple's performance or outlook.  The pervasive negative sentiment surrounding DeepSeek and the broader AI sector creates a bearish environment.  Although previous predictions were mixed, with some models leaning towards a neutral or slightly positive outlook, the overall weight of the news points toward a higher likelihood of a price drop. The uncertainty surrounding the earnings release introduces some volatility, but the dominant negative sentiment heavily influences the probability estimation. The consensus from previous models also leans toward a higher probability of a price fall. I've therefore weighted the probability of a fall higher, reflecting the substantial impact of DeepSeek's emergence and the lack of positive news directly related to Apple.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news highlights a significant sell-off in tech stocks, particularly due to the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has raised concerns about increased competition in the AI sector. While Apple's upcoming earnings report is mentioned, there is no specific positive or negative news directly impacting Apple. The broader negative sentiment in the tech sector, coupled with uncertainty around Apple's earnings, suggests a cautious outlook. Previous predictions from other models also reflect this mixed sentiment, with a slight tilt towards a higher probability of the stock price falling due to the overall market volatility and competitive pressures. Apple's strong financial position and potential positive earnings could counterbalance some of the negative sentiment, but the prevailing uncertainty and sector-wide concerns weigh heavily.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The financial news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has raised competition fears among major players like Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia. Apple's upcoming earnings report could potentially be impacted by the broader market volatility and uncertainty caused by DeepSeek's advancements and the reactions of other tech giants. While there is no direct negative news about Apple, the overall sentiment suggests caution, with a slight lean towards a potential decline due to the competitive pressures and market sensitivity. Considering the mixed predictions from various models, the consensus leans towards a slightly higher probability of the stock price falling compared to rising.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to the emergence of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, which has raised competition fears among major players like Apple. While there is anticipation surrounding Apple's upcoming earnings report, the negative sentiment in the broader market, triggered by the sell-off in related tech stocks, creates an environment of uncertainty. Considering the mixed signals and previous predictions, I estimate a slight lean towards a potential decline due to the competitive pressures and market sensitivity.

The overall sentiment in the sector is negative, as reflected in the broad tech stock sell-off and concerns over AI competition. While Apple is set to release its fiscal first quarter results, the news itself does not provide specific details about Apple's performance or outlook. The anticipation of Apple's earnings introduces uncertainty. Previous predictions varied, ranging from slightly bearish to neutral. Considering the neutral position and mixed signals, alongside Apple's strong historical performance and upcoming earnings, the probability leans slightly towards a minor decline but remains somewhat balanced.
Round: 3
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The financial news indicates significant volatility in the tech sector, primarily driven by the emergence of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, which has incited a widespread sell-off among major tech companies, including concerns for Apple. While anticipation for Apple's upcoming earnings report introduces some uncertainty, the broader negative sentiment surrounding increased competition and the sell-off in tech stocks suggests a cautious investor outlook. The majority of models lean towards a probability of decline, reflecting apprehension and market sensitivity, especially given the absence of clear positive indications specific to Apple. Therefore, I estimate a higher probability of the stock price falling compared to rising.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.48, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.52, Reasoning: The narrative surrounding Apple is consistently overshadowed by the broader market anxieties stemming from DeepSeek's rise and its potential disruption of the tech industry. Although Apple's earnings are imminent, there's a consensus across previous predictions that the prevailing negative sentiment within the tech sector makes a price fall marginally more likely. The absence of specific positive news directly pertaining to Apple in the provided articles exacerbates this caution. The slight bounce-back I am predicting is due to the fact that the negative news has already been factored into the the predictions for 3 rounds in a row. Furthermore, other competitors such as Microsoft and Nvidia have made very positive statements of AI's benefits. I am also considering that the other model predictions might reflect some private and positive information that those models are privy to. Therefore I am slightly more optimistic than the previous rounds.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.35, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.65, Reasoning: The news focuses heavily on the disruptive potential of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, and its impact on the tech sector. This has caused a significant sell-off, impacting major players like Nvidia.  While Apple's upcoming earnings are highly relevant, the prevailing negative sentiment and uncertainty created by DeepSeek overshadow any positive expectations.  Previous predictions from various AI models show a consistent trend towards a higher probability of a price fall than a price rise.  While Apple's strong financial performance and potential for positive earnings announcements could counteract this negative sentiment, the market's general volatility and the lack of specific positive news regarding Apple in this particular news piece make a price drop more likely in the immediate term. The consensus from multiple rounds of predictions also points towards a bearish outlook, further reinforcing the probability of a price fall.

The overall sentiment in the sector is negative, as reflected in the broad tech stock sell-off and concerns over AI competition. Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]",

}
